alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 01 at 3:22PM HST until December 02 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH TONIGHT... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND TONIGHT AND FRIDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI ON FRIDAY... .A large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) will peak this afternoon and evening then decrease on Friday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf up to 20 to 26 feet this afternoon and evening then lowering to 15 to 20 feet on Friday. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai Southwest, Waianae Coast, Oahu North Shore, Maui Windward West, Kauai North, Molokai Windward, Molokai North, Molokai West and Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...For the High Surf Warning, until 6 AM HST Friday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala
